locations.headline: Lojas perto de você

error.direct_ship: This combination is not available for direct ship, select a different option or check if it's available at a store near you.

cart.coupon_was_added: O cupom foi adicionado ao carrinho!
cart.coupons_not_supported: Adicione cupons e vales presente durante o checkout
cart.reservation_hint: * Prices may vary from store to store and online. For Reserve Online orders certain state and local fees may not be reflected in the total. {shopName} is not responsible for the errors or omissions in pricing and quality.

errors.insufficientstock: One or more products in the cart are out of stock. Please remove the products and try again.
errors.multiplelocations: Orders are limited to a single pickup store, please select only one fulfillment location.
errors.productsNotFound: One or more products has been removed from your cart due to unavailability.
errors.mixed_cart: We currently do not support Ship to Address and Reserve to Cart within the same transaction. Please update your delivery options and continue shopping or proceed to checkout.
errors.direct_ship_item: Check if this item is available for reserve at a store near you.
errors.ropis_cart_inventory: Not all of your items can be reserved. Please check the products in cart and change fulfillment options.
errors.ropis_item_inventory: This item is not available for reservation at the selected location. Check for availability at a different location.
errors.ropis_item_inventory_exceed: This item is not available in the desired quantity at {storeName}. {inventory} will be reserved.
errors.mixed_cart_coupon_removed: The coupon "{code}" is not valid for in store reservations. Once you have placed the reservation it will be available for direct ship orders again.
